content:

ACE Recruiters Limited (RC: 1397156) commenced operations March 2017. We are a People and Business Management Consulting firm passionate about adding value. We offer services in the areas of Strategic Human Resource Consulting and we have the capacity to ensure returns on investment in the following areas: Outsourcing – Personnel, Sales & Business Process Human Resources Consulting Training and Development Sales Support – Market Intelligence, Promotion & Activation With a strong drive to be one of the best in our areas of core competences, we pride ourselves as specialists in our chosen field of endeavour. We are driven by a sense of mutually beneficial relationships with our clients, striving to create high performance teams, and deliver agile operations that responds and drives the ever changing ways of doing business/working.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Direct Sales Agent

Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Meeting or exceeding weekly, monthly, and yearly sales targets.
	Canvassing assigned territories to present company products to potential customers.
	Assisting management in identifying viable marketing and pricing strategies.
	Attending trade shows and other industry-related events.
	Preparing sales proposals for potential buyers.
	Demonstrating product features to customers.
	Contacting leads and setting up appointments to present company products.
	Completing order forms and submitting them for processing.
	Completing regular sales reports specifying the number of sales made.


Requirements


	OND or SSCE.
	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business Administration or related field is advantageous.
	Proven sales experience.
	The ability to retain important information.
	Sound consultative selling skills.
	Excellent networking skills.
	Strong negotiation skills.
	Effective communication skills.
	Exceptional customer service skills.


Salary
N95,000 - N150,000

title: Investment Advisor (Corporate Marketer) Job at AT Limited
content:
AT Limited - Our client, a Real Estate company, is recruiting a dynamic and results-driven candidate to fill the position below:

Job Position: Investment Advisor (Corporate Marketer)
Job Locations: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly qualified and experienced Investment Advisor (Corporate Marketer) for our client in the real estate sector.
	The ideal candidate must have a strong background in investment advisory, corporate marketing, and client relationship management.
	This role requires a strategic thinker with excellent communication skills and the ability to attract and retain high-net-worth investors while driving business growth.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and managing corporate client relationships, promoting real estate investment opportunities, and driving sales growth through strategic marketing and advisory services.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement corporate marketing strategies to attract high-net-worth individuals and institutional investors.
	Identify, engage, and maintain relationships with potential corporate clients and investors interested in real estate assets.
	Provide investment advisory services tailored to clients’ financial goals and risk appetite.
	Conduct market research to analyze trends, competitor activities, and investment opportunities within the real estate sector.
	Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to design and execute targeted campaigns for corporate investors.
	Present and pitch real estate investment opportunities to potential investors through meetings, presentations, and networking events.
	Ensure compliance with all legal and regulatory requirements in real estate investment transactions.
	Negotiate terms of investment deals and facilitate contract execution in alignment with company policies.
	Monitor and report on market dynamics, customer preferences, and sales performance to drive strategic decision-making.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Finance, Real Estate, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in investment advisory, corporate sales, or real estate marketing.
	Strong understanding of real estate investment strategies and financial analysis.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Proven ability to develop and maintain relationships with corporate clients and investors.
	Goal-oriented with a strong drive for revenue generation and business growth.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and CRM tools.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 Gross monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: hr.department.atlimited@gmail.com using "Application for Investment Advisor (Corporate Marketer)" as the subject of the mail.

title: Admin Manager, Industrial Gas Plant Job at Cometstar Industrial Gases Limited
content:
Cometstar Industrial Gases Limited producesargon, nitrogen, oxygen, and carbon dioxide — gases that aid operations in multiple sectors, including pharmaceuticals, healthcare, power, oil, steel, manufacturing, Fire Service, and food and beverages.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin Manager, Industrial Gas Plant

Job Location: Agbara, Ogun

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The ideal candidate must be dynamic, strategic, and resourceful with exceptional management and leadership skills. 
	He must have 5+ years of experience in plant management within the industrial gas sector.


Core Responsibilities


	Oversee the daily operations of the plant to ensure efficiency in operations, risks and profitability
	Plan, streamline, and execute administrative workflows and procedures
	Manage the plant’s personnel, physical and budgeting/financial resources to improve the company’s bottom line
	Provide overall guidance and strategic direction in the planning and execution of production and service objectives
	Ensure and maintain the highest standards of quality control and safety compliance in line with regulations
	Monitor and analyse KPIs to identify areas for improvement
	Oversee customer interactions and resolve any issues including liaison with external contractors and vendors.


Experience and Qualification


	HND / Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Production Technology, Business, or a related field.
	5+ years in managing an industrial gas plant is mandatory
	A master’s degree in management is an added advantage
	Strong practical knowledge of industrial gas manufacturing processes, safety standards, storage, retail trade, and dispensing
	Proven leadership and team management skills.


Skills and Behaviours:


	Knowledge of principles of business administration
	Familiar with process improvement principles
	Excellent leadership, delegation and people management
	Patience and great attention to detail
	Business acumen, financial analytics and numeracy skills
	Working knowledge of marketing strategies.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should their CV to: career@cometstar-group.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
